title: Ballot images
context: [ยง11-121] Ballot images. A voter shall not be prohibited from distributing or sharing an electronic or digital image of the voter&rsquo;s own marked ballot via social media or other means regardless of how the voter acquired the image; provided that this section shall not be a defense for any election offenses under chapter 19 or related offenses under the Penal Code. [L 2016, c 81, ยง1] Cross References Ballot removal or exhibition; prohibition, see ยง11-137.
